ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] In a rut at 40
ygData.msgSnippet: if rathe mountains isnt busy, you can try charm kiting giants (if its not busy). You can make good cash here, the plat gets heavy but you can buy rubies for
ygData.messageBody:
if rathe mountains isnt busy, you can try charm kiting giants (if its not
busy). You can make good cash here, the plat gets heavy but you can buy
rubies for 131 and resell em later for 119 each, instead of running to bank
all the time. When I did that for a level or 2, i came out of rathe
mountains with 2 stacks of 20 rubies. Just a thought... Or you can try
Dreadlands kiting is good there too, I found that way back then the birds
were not too shabby xp, and the monkeys, dogs werent worth it...

Minkin

-----Original Message-----
From: Christopher Sanders [mailto:christopher.sanders@...]
Sent: October 9, 2001 1:46 PM
To: Eqbards (E-mail)
Subject: [eqbards] In a rut at 40


Ok, I've been 40 for about a month now, and have 2 bubbles to go. I'm sick
of being 40!!

I'm also sick of pickup groups! Heh. So, any advice would be welcome on
where to go at this level, and what song combination to use to solo me 2
bubbles as quickly as possible.

I've been using chains-fulfils-tuyens, but it takes so long to kill a frost
giant this way...I get bored quickly (hence, 40 for a month...hehe).

Thank you!
Atonal
